title: Easygoing: transport services for people with special needs
brief_description: This video provides important and practical information on the facilities available to assist people with special needs in using Victorian public transport. Through stories of five public transport users, the video highlights the varied services for improved access to public transport and outlines the plans to further improve access in the years ahead.
